name: CrashRoad
description:
▶ You’ll regret it if you don’t download this now.
▶ Just watching the game will make you laugh. Do you know what “tricked out” is?
▶ “Tricked out” scenes that are guaranteed to make you laugh!
▶ Just go ahead and download it :)

■■■■■Game Introduction■■■■■

This is so awesome!
A crazy, exciting trip running at full speed
30 funny characters that’ll crack you up
A new map is unlocked when you acquire a new character!!
Fun like you’ve never experienced before
All kinds of fun from many different angles
“Tricked out” fun guaranteed!!

■ Tap to move to the top, bottom, left or right and dodge obstacles!
■ Dodge at the last minute to stack combos. Activate the booster by collecting combos!
■ Acquire hero characters. They fire different things and destroy the enemies that are in front of you!
■ Keep getting the same character? Upgrade!


Daeri Soft games will continue!
